text.tspan: Reported paralytic polio cases and deaths, United States, 1910 to 2019
The reported figures include both wild- and vaccine-derived type polio infections that occurred indigenously and as
Data source: Our World In Data based on US Public Health Service; US Center for Disease Control; and WHO
